summary.Title: Manual System Tester
summary.Presentation: Imagine a future - where internet connectivity knows no boundaries. Do you want to join one of the leading manufacturers of communication and satellite equipment on a fantastic transformational jou

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Imagine a future - where internet connectivity knows no boundaries. Do you want to join one of the leading manufacturers of communication and satellite equipment on a fantastic transformational journey?

 

We are looking for a skilled System Tester to specify and perform manual and automated tests on our ground infrastructure systems to ensure that the quality is correct before the system is delivered to the customer.

 

You will be part of our R&D teams on ground infrastructure projects. Your job will be to handle the tasks in relation to verification of the system in close collaboration with the entire R&D team. Your role will also be to participate in the acceptance test together with the customer. You must therefore also be able to work independently and in a structured manner and take responsibility for the delivery of asystem with a high quality.

 

You’re excited to work with:

  • Embedded systems, mobile network infrastructure

What you’ve done before:

  • Background as a graduate with experience in testing or development on embedded systems
  • Review of requirements specifications and technical design descriptions
  • Preparation of test plans and design of test specifications based on product requirements
  • Design, build and maintain test setups
  • Verification of functions and requirements by execution of manual and automated tests
  • Documentation of test execution
  • Execution of acceptance test with customers in factory and on site

We offer:

  • B2B 8000-15000 PLN net/month OR UoP 7000-11.000 gross/month
  • Stable, permanent employment based on your choice (UoP/B2B)
  • Remote hybrid option – we’d love to see you at least twice a week
  • Medical package
  • Stay-on bonus
  • Central and modern office space in Kraków
  • Onboarding trip to Copenhagen
  • Flat management structure following a Scandinavian work culture

Apply if you want to do things that matter!

 

#jobsforukraine
